title: emment
author: emment
content: Unimeta will launch the FOMOSPORT (www.fomosport.club) sports competition aggregation project on November 14, 2022.FOMOSPORT is a competition and aggregation project based on the concept of web 3. Its sections cover sports event quiz, electronic brokerage, chess and card web 3. Gaming.In order to celebrate the arrival of the football World Cup, which is held every four years, FOMOSPORT first launched the first sports competition quiz project.FOMOSPORT’s World Cup project is a simple betting game. To participate, you only need to choose to be a bettor or a banker. Of course, you can have both.Unimeta will launch the FOMOSPORT (www.fomosport.club) sports competition aggregation project on November 14, 2022.FOMOSPORT is a competition and aggregation project based on the concept of web 3. Its sections cover sports event quiz, electronic brokerage, chess and card web 3. Gaming.In order to celebrate the arrival of the football World Cup, which is held every four years, FOMOSPORT first launched the first sports competition quiz project.FOMOSPORT’s World Cup project is a simple betting game. To participate, you only need to choose to be a bettor or a banker. Of course, you can have both.FOMOSPORT will only take 3.5% of the handling fee in the betting this time, and 2% of it will be given to players who inject into the banker pool as an additional reward.How to become an ambassador?1、Log in to the project address: www.fomosport.club and sign your wallet.2、Submit information on this page: https://forms.office.com/r/WchdviinccIn the near future, FOMOSPORT will introduce more sports, including emerging e-sports, etc.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: You are looking for ambassadors, you teach us how to become one, but you forget to mention what's the benefit of becoming one.What would i get if i become an ambassador of your site?And tell us more about the house bankroll, how you will pay the winner bets? Will that come from your pocket or from ambassadors pockets?Personally I'm afraid to connect my wallet to your site, please tell us why should we trust it. And do you have a White paper or a road map?

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Very little information about the company is available on the website, even Unimeta is not clear referring to which company (at least I'm not aware of any company called this). Be careful before you start joining this, you might find a better chance at other referral programs from other companies who are running sig campaigns on this forum instead.
